result.execSummary:
The defendant Joshua R. Bertrand was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Joshua R. Bertrand is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Joshua R. Bertrand was found guilty of Hit and Run, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 346.67(1).
  • Joshua R. Bertrand was found guilty of Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Use of a Dangerous Weapon], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Joshua R. Bertrand in court in custody with attorney Jane Powless Wagner.  Perry L Folts appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Count 1 and 4 defendant pleads no contest. Court finds defendant guilty of counts 1 and 4. Court orders count 1 6 months jail with huber for treatment. Costs DOC collect. Count 4 9 months jail with huber for treatment. Costs DOC collect. Both counts concurrent with Salk County case 14CF42 and Rock County cases 15CM787 and 15CM627. Sentence credit 85 days. Count 2 dismissed and read in.

Defendant Joshua R. Bertrand in court in custody with attorney Jane Powless Wagner.  Richard Jay Sullivan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for November 10, 2015 at 10:30 am.

Defendant Joshua R. Bertrand in court in custody with attorney Jane Powless Wagner.  Mason C. Braunschweig appeared for the State of Wisconsin. FELONY COUNT 3 DISMISSED ON STATES MOTION. Stands mute not guilty plea entered on MISDEMEANOR COUNTS 1,2 & 4.

Defendant Joshua R. Bertrand in court in custody with attorney Jane Powless Wagner.  Gerald Anthony Urbik and intern Christa Johnson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for September 1, 2015, at 1:00 pm.

No contact directly or indirectly with victim, G.O. or N.G.O.  his/her residence, place of employment, vehicle, or elsewhere.  May not possess any weapons or firearms.  Cannot operate a motor vehicle during pendency of case without valid drivers license or insurance.

Defendant Joshua R. Bertrand in court in custody with attorney Jason Mitchel Daane.  Cheniqua White and intern Christa Johnson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Complaint filed, copy to Defendant, penalties advised, rights given, reading waived.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for August 13, 2015, at 9:00 am.

No contact directly or indirectly with victim, G.O. or N.G.O.  his/her residence, place of employment, vehicle, or elsewhere.  May not possess any weapons or firearms.  Cannot operate a motor vehicle during pendency of case without valid drivers license or insurance.
